title: Swipe Right to Dismiss a Story
description: Dismissing stories is a quick way to skip a news item to make room for a new one.

title: Long Press to Share a Story
description: Long pressing a news item will reveal quick share options for facebook, twitter and the native share sheet.

title: Find Read & Dismissed Stories in the ‘Recent’ tab
description: Want to find a great story that you read or that one story you accidentally dismissed? Go to the recent tab.

title: Choose the Amount of Stories shown in Settings
description: Just want to see a single story? Choose exactly how many stories you want to show in the settings tab.

title: Strip styling and open Stories in Readability
description: In the settings tab you can enable readability that opens all stories in a simplified easier to read layout.

title: Just Type the Website Name and We’ll Search for the Feed
description: No one remembers or can be bothered to find the exact feed url. That’s why Breaking will search any website for the exact feed address.

title: Leave a Review
description: Breaking is built by indie developers and if you enjoy using the app, we could really use a review from you on the app store. Thanks!
